
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
# define sz(a) int((a).size())
# define all(c) (c).begin(),(c).end() 
# define allr(c) (c).rbegin(),(c).rend() 

using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        string s;
        cin >> s;
        int sm = 0;
        for (char x: s) {
            if (x >= '0' && x <= '9') sm += (x - '0');
        }
        cout << sm << endl;
    }
}
